entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Indenting a raw string literal breaks it when a line starts with different whitespace than the IDE indents with #59594
  • The IDE interferes with typing a new raw string literal #59593
  • "Convert to raw string" fixer which removes indentation and initial blank line from the string value #59591
  • Ctrl+Left/Right Arrow inside raw string literals does not behave as expected #59581
    17.2
  • Issues with formatting and whitespace around !! annotation #59580
  • Change Inline Hints shortcut/behavior to be Ctrl+Ctrl with a toggle like behavior #59579
    Backlog
  • Roslyn suggests conflicting IDE0044/IDE0064 code fixes #59577
    Backlog
  • SDK Update from 6.0.102 to 6.0.200 breaks C# from JSON generation in MSBuild context #59590

Closed

  • `args` in top-level program should be colored as a contextual keyword. #59569
    17.2
  • Disabled including binaries for generators in latest .net sdk preview #59209
    17.2
  • Type inference fails for Func<Expression<Func<T>>> #57517
    17.1
  • IDE0017 suggestion breaks on field cross-reference #59576
    17.2
  • Test AsyncIteratorWithAwaitAndYieldAndAwait is flaky #57797
    17.2
  • `CSharpAddParameterCheckCodeRefactoringProvider` doesn't respect `PreferParameterNullChecking` #59559
    17.2
  • List patterns: no error is emitted when Length is missing or inaccessible #59465
    17.2
  • Gold bar trying to show light bulb #47640
    17.2
  • Misspellings in CodeLens in 'ru' localization #59020
  • Null-checking nullable param warning should be relaxed #59226
    17.2
  • The pre-selected "Suggest Name" for parameters has inconistent casing and violates .editorconfig #59562

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix DateTime completion appearing innapropriately #59592
    Area-IDE
  • Move VisualStudioProject.BatchingDocumentCollection to it's own file #59589
    Area-IDE
  • Backport "Remove handling of certain BCL binaries from our build" to 17.0 #59588
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Port more tests #59587
    Area-IDE
  • Remove potential partial snapshot in codefixservice #59586
    Area-IDE
  • Allow codefixservice to stream codefixes as it is computed, instead of waiting for all fixes to be ready. #59585
    Area-IDE
  • Compute fixes by order of fixers, so we don't have to sort them after #59584
    Area-IDE
  • Print method name in ILVerify output #59583
    Area-Compilers
  • Propagate CodeActionOptions through fix all #59575
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • [LSP] Use runtime type arguments for streamjsonrpc request handling #59510
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Colorize 'args' in top-level program #59574
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Handle binary AdditionalTexts in the AdditionalTextComparer. #59578
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, Next
  • Fix typos #59237
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • CodeFixService simplifications #59582
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update breaking changes document for 17.0 struct initializer fixes #59245
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • [17.0] Report errors for structs with missing field initializers and implicit parameterless constructor #59055
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Move global options to EditorFeature layer #59071
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Respect PreferParameterNullChecking user option #59561
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59572
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59573
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • List-patterns: report error when no suitable length member #59475
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, Next
  • Rename Basic to Visual Basic in Visual Studio options page #53134
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into Utf8StringLiterals #59570
    Area-Compilers, auto-merge
  • Support parsing of checked user-defined operator declarations #59504
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
  • Handle nullability attributes in param-nullchecking #59393
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #59595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #59597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update Parser.md #56987
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic Snippets: Console snippet first look #59303
    Area-IDE
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Try to reuse previously parsed trees when changing parse options #59406
    Area-IDE
  • Value Tracking: Remove inproc symbol usage #59473
    Area-IDE
  • Diagnostic incremental analyzer #59456
    Area-IDE
  • Refactor indentation API #57529
    Area-IDE
  • Address feedback from previous pattern matching ReadOnlySpan<char> change #59451
    Area-Compilers
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Clean up diagnostic and solution crawler options - take 2 #59233
    Area-IDE
  • Add external access APIs for O# #59469
    Area-IDE
  • Produce better error for members in top-level main #59321
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Consolidate data tracked over an async completion session #59553
    Area-IDE
  • add all analyzers that are configured via editorconfig to code cleanup #59106
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid loading assemblies that only contain IDE analyzers #59554
    Area-IDE
